title: Got an Apple Mac iThing Update it right now – theres a shedload of security holes fixed
text:
Got an Apple Mac, iThing? Update it right now – there's a shedload of security holes fixed 
The Register Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
update also "improves compatibility with Microsoft Office 2016," so if you've been having crashes with Redmond's productivity suite, this upgrade should be the fix you've been waiting for. 
Here are the security bugs that have been patched today: 
...
